other_title: まりあ†ほりっく あらいぶ
opening_theme: #1: "Mousou Senshi Miyamae Kanako (妄想戦士 宮前かなこ)" by Sugita Tomokazu (eps 1-4)
#2: "Run Run Riru Ran Ran Rara (るんるんりる らんらんらら)" by Yuu Kobayashi (eps 5, 7-12)
#3: "Run Run Riru Ran Ran Rara Matsurika Version (るんるんりる らんらんらら （茉莉花 ヴァージョン）) " by Marina Inoue (ep 6)
ending_theme: #1: "Dounimo Tomaranai (どうにもとまらない)" by Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Sanada and Marina Inoue (eps 1-11)
#2: "Donmai Donmai! (ドンマイ　ドンマイ！)" by Yuu Kobayashi as Mariya Shidou & Suteki na Nakamatachi (ep 12)
